about_the_game:
Design a soft and playful bedroom that’s perfect for daydreaming with The Sims™ 4 Pastel Pop Kit. Blend simple and psychedelic with quirky pastel prints, irregular shapes, and vintage vibes. This collection is perfect for your Sim’s dorm, bedroom, or studio apartment.

KEY FEATURES
  • Avant Basic — Decorating should be fun and carefree! Give your room a quirky side with irregular but simple shapes in dreamy pastel colors. This collection has heart chairs, mirrors shaped like puddles, and even more ways to incorporate whimsy into everyday design.
  • Blast From the Past — Create a contemporary space that draws inspiration from times gone by. The patterned bed sheets and psychedelically curved table legs in this kit are nostalgic for summertime in the 60s and 70s, but they still fit right in with modern, understated décor.

Design a soft and playful bedroom that’s perfect for daydreaming with The Sims™ 4 Pastel Pop Kit. Blend simple and psychedelic with quirky pastel prints, irregular shapes, and vintage vibes. This collection is perfect for your Sim’s dorm, bedroom, or studio apartment.

KEY FEATURES
  • Avant Basic — Decorating should be fun and carefree! Give your room a quirky side with irregular but simple shapes in dreamy pastel colors. This collection has heart chairs, mirrors shaped like puddles, and even more ways to incorporate whimsy into everyday design.
  • Blast From the Past — Create a contemporary space that draws inspiration from times gone by. The patterned bed sheets and psychedelically curved table legs in this kit are nostalgic for summertime in the 60s and 70s, but they still fit right in with modern, understated décor.
drm_notice: EA on-line activation and Origin client software installation and background use required.
legal_notice: *Requires The Sims 4 & all game updates. See minimum system requirements for the pack.
name: The Sims™ 4 Pastel Pop Kit

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: The Sims™ 4 Pastel Pop Kit - $4.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy The Sims™ 4 Pastel Pop Kit

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 Bit Required. Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.3 GHz Intel Core i3-3220 (2 cores, 4 threads), AMD Ryzen 3 1200 3.1 GHz (4 cores) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB of Video RAM and support for Pixel Shader 3.0. Supported Video Cards: NVIDIA GeForce 6600 or better, ATI Radeon X1300 or better, Intel GMA X4500 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 26 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 Bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i5 (4 cores), AMD Ryzen 5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB of Video RAM, NVIDIA GTX 650, AMD Radeon HD 7750, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 51 GB available space

short_description: Design a soft and playful bedroom that’s perfect for daydreaming with The Sims™ 4 Pastel Pop Kit.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Japanese, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Swedish, Finnish, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean
